title: WTB>>T206 Walter Johnson Portrait PSA or SGC
author: investinrookies

posts.post_title: WTB>>T206 Walter Johnson Portrait PSA or SGC
posts.post_content:
Looking for a nice centered example with high eye appeal.  Preferably grades 3-5 but will consider a lower grade if has very nice eye appeal.  Less about the grade and more about the eye appeal for me, SGC or PSA.  Please PM if you have one your willing to part with.

Thanks
